abstract: Vows column on wedding of Tom Postilio and Mickey Conlon.

headline.print_headline: Off Broadway, Closing Their Biggest Deal
headline.main: Off Broadway, Showmen Seal Their Biggest Deal

snippet: Tom Postilio and Mickey Conlon, stars of an HGTV real estate show, are signing the papers on a life of wedded bliss.
lead_paragraph: Tom Postilio and Mickey Conlon, stars of an HGTV real estate show, are signing the papers on a life of wedded bliss.
